entry.def: A room is one of the separate sections or parts of the inside of a building. Rooms have their own walls, ceilings, floors, and doors, and are usually used for particular activities. You can refer to all the people who are in a room as the room .
entry.tran: 房间;屋子;室;房间里的所有人

example.ex: A minute later he excused himself and left the room...
example.tran: 一分钟之后，他说了声抱歉就离开了房间。

example.ex: Downstairs are two small rooms: a kitchen and a sitting room...
example.tran: 楼下是两个小房间：一个厨房和一个起居室。

entry.def: If you talk about your room, you are referring to the room that you alone use, especially your bedroom at home or your office at work.
entry.tran: 私人房间（尤指卧室或办公室）

example.ex: If you're running upstairs, go to my room and bring down my sweater, please.
example.tran: 如果你上楼，麻烦到我的房间把我的毛衣拿下来。

entry.def: A room is a bedroom in a hotel.

example.ex: Toni booked a room in an hotel not far from Arzfeld.
example.tran: 托妮在离阿茨费尔德不远的一家宾馆订了一个房间。

entry.def: If you room with someone, you share a rented room, apartment, or house with them, for example when you are a student.

example.ex: I had roomed with him in New Haven when we were both at Yale Law School.
example.tran: 我和他都在耶鲁法学院读书的时候，在纽黑文合租了一个房间。

entry.def: If there is room somewhere, there is enough empty space there for people or things to be fitted in, or for people to move freely or do what they want to.

example.ex: There is usually room to accommodate up to 80 visitors...
example.tran: 那里通常可以住得下80位来客。

example.ex: There wasn't enough room in the baggage compartment for all the gear...
example.tran: 行李舱没有足够的空间放下所有的工具。

entry.def: If there is room for a particular kind of behaviour or action, people are able to behave in that way or to take that action.

example.ex: The intensity of the work left little room for personal grief or anxiety...
example.tran: 高强度的工作使人几乎没空去悲伤或者忧虑。

example.ex: Once the plaster was dry there was no room for correction...
example.tran: 一旦灰泥一干，就没有机会修改了。

entry.def: If you have room for manoeuvre, you have the opportunity to change your plans if it becomes necessary or desirable.
entry.tran: 作出改变的机会;回旋的余地

example.ex: With an election looming, he has little room for manoeuvre.
example.tran: 随着大选临近，他几乎没有什么回旋的余地了。

means.word_mean: 1. an area within a building enclosed by walls and floor and ceiling;

sentences.sentence: "the rooms were very small but they had a nice view"
"hardly enough elbow room to turn around"

means.word_mean: 4. the people who are present in a room;
1. live and take one's meals at or in;

sentences.sentence: "she rooms in an old boarding house"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English rūm, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch ruim, German Raum

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 鲁姆 Roman的变体

sentences.cn: 他走出房间，猛地关上了房门。
sentences.en: He walked out of the room and slammed the door.

sentences.cn: 他们在隔壁房间里，我们可以听到他们说的每一句话。
sentences.en: They were in the next room and we could hear every word they said.

sentences.cn: 餐厅；起居室

sentences.en: They had to sit in the waiting room for an hour.

sentences.cn: 我看西蒙就在他自己的房间里。
sentences.en: I think Simon is in his room (= bedroom) .

sentences.cn: 我不想看电视。我到别的房间去吧。
sentences.en: I don't want to watch television. I'll be in the other room (= a different room) .

sentences.cn: 双人 / 单人客房

sentences.cn: 这张桌子还有一个人的位置。

sentences.cn: 你的写字台上还摆得了一台电脑吗？

sentences.cn: 是的，还很空呢。

sentences.cn: 我要挪动一下这张桌子——它太占地方了。
sentences.en: I'll move the table─it takes up too much room .

sentences.cn: 我们怎么腾得出地方放这些家具呢？

sentences.cn: 他必须确定无误。不能有任何的犹疑。

sentences.cn: 尽管工作稳定，但是“凭一己之力无法负担月供，因此不得不把房间租给别人以负担月供，”他说。
sentences.en: Even now that he is working steadily, he said." I can't afford to pay ma monthly mortgage payments on my own, so I have to rent rooms out to people to mark that happen.

sentences.cn: 当被单独留在房间里时，那些不知道哪些笔会让他们触电的学生比那些知道会发生这种情况的学生按了更多的笔，并且遭受了更多的电击
sentences.en: When left alone in the room, the students who did not know which ones would shock them clicked more pens and incurred more jolts than the students who knew what would happen.

sentences.cn: 灯、灯具和房间三者最终都要以让使用者真正受益为中心。
sentences.en: The lamp, the fixture, and the room, all three must work in concert for the true benefits of end users.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 如果 CFL 是为特定空间照明或仅照亮空间内的一个物体，其装置的设计必须和灯本身匹配，灯具装置也要与房间相匹配。
sentences.en: If the CFL should be used for lighting a particular space, or an object within that space, the fixture must be designed to work with that lamp, and that fixture with the room.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但现在，以色列的研究人员报告称，甚至睡在同一个房间也会有不良后果：不是对孩子，而是对妈妈。
sentences.en: But now Israeli researchers are reporting that even sleeping in the same room can have negative consequences: not for the child,but for the mother.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 另一方面，婴儿无论是否和妈妈睡在同一个房间，都未出现睡眠质量变差的情况。
sentences.en: Infants, on the other hand, didn’t appear to have worse sleep whether they slept in the same or different room from their mothers.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 如今，为了减少出现婴儿猝死综合征的风险，美国儿科学会建议妈妈不要跟宝宝睡在一张床上，而是睡在同一个房间。
sentences.en: Right now, to reduce the risk of sudden infant death syndrome,  the American Academy of Pediatrics recommends that mothers not sleep in the same bed as their babies, but sleep in the same room.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 如果有可能，你也应该尽量在将举行考试的房间里学习。
sentences.en: If possible, you should also try to learn information in the room where it is going to be tested.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 到达的客人们可以绕过前台，直接进入自己的房间。
sentences.en: Arriving guests could bypass the front desk and go straight to their rooms.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 该应用程序将使用蓝牙技术，点一下手机就可打开房间。
sentences.en: The app will use Bluetooth technology to unlock the room with a tap.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 罗纳尔多请行李员把行李送到房间.
sentences.en: Ronaldo asks baggageman to deliver baggage to a room.

sentences.cn: 其中一个说除了蓝色的天空,他不看到任何东西.
sentences.en: One said he could not see anything except the blue of the sky.

sentences.cn: 那个有钱人的墓穴比汤姆的房间还大.
sentences.en: That rich man's undercroft is bigger than Tom's room.

sentences.cn: 这棵圣诞树差不多同这间房间一般高.
sentences.en: The Christmas tree almost as tall as room.

sentences.cn: 您喜欢哪一种房间?
sentences.en: Which kind of room would you prefer?

sentences.cn: 我想要一间视线好(有阳台)的房间.
sentences.en: I'd like a room a nice view a balcony.

sentences.cn: 这个房间隔音.
sentences.en: This room is insulated against noise.

sentences.cn: 行李舱没有足够的空间放下所有的工具。
sentences.en: There wasn't enough room in the baggage compartment for all the gear...

sentences.cn: 尽管如此，最高法院或许还想要为警方引证有权行使更多自主行为的情形留下空间。
sentences.en: The court, though, may want to allow room for police to cite situations where they are entitled to more freedom.

sentences.cn: 还有一部分原因是机场安检通道空间有限。
sentences.en: Part of the issue is that airports have only so much room for screening lanes.

sentences.cn: 哈格尔说，在美国，我们往往把工作设 计成“高度模式化”、“高度标准化”，以至于: 几乎没给人们留下“发挥个人主动性和创造力”的空间。
sentences.en: Hagel says we have designed jobs in the U.S. that tend to be “tightly scripted” and “highly standardized” ones that leave no room for “individual initiative or creativity”.

sentences.cn: 如果 CFL 是为特定空间照明或仅照亮空间内的一个物体，其装置的设计必须和灯本身匹配，灯具装置也要与房间相匹配。
sentences.en: If the CFL should be used for lighting a particular space, or an object within that space, the fixture must be designed to work with that lamp, and that fixture with the room.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 这种瓶颈模式不仅限制了电路运行的自由而且占用了电路协调的空间.
sentences.en: This bottleneck has restricted the freedom in circuit implementation and provides no room for circuit tuning.

sentences.cn: 有空间给我放全部行李 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you have room for all my luggage?

sentences.cn: 一项联合国报道说那时在地球上只剩下站着的空间.
sentences.en: An UN report says that there will be standing room only on the earth then.

sentences.cn: 房间里的镜子老是给人空间变大的感觉.
sentences.en: Mirrors in a room often give an illusion of space.

sentences.cn: 植物应充分间隔开以便有生长空间.
sentences.en: The plants should be spread out well to allow room for growth.

sentences.cn: 而在球场上, 这位高大的新手显示他还有成长的空间.
sentences.en: And on the basketball court, the towering rookie has shown he still has room to grow.

sentences.cn: 狭小的床层层叠放, 中间几乎不留空间.
sentences.en: The narrow beds are stacked one above the other, with little room in between.

sentences.cn: 采煤工作面是地下移动着的工作空间.
sentences.en: Working face is the floating working room underground.

sentences.cn: 船只橫七竖八地挤在一起,几乎没有多少移动的空间.
sentences.en: The clutter of ships had little room to manoeuvre.

sentences.cn: 这些数字怎么看都确实可观, 而且有很大空间进一步增长.
sentences.en: These are impressive figures by any standard, and there is plenty of room for further growth.

sentences.cn: 这头慈父熊教会我们就家长’责任’而言, ’ 无能 ’ 总还有很多发展空间.
sentences.en: This fatherly bear teaches us that there's always room for " inability " in parental " responsibility. "

sentences.cn: 只有现在的房间方能称为生活空间.
sentences.en: Only actual rooms can be called living space.

sentences.cn: 这也可以使美国可以有更多的和中国官员沟通的空间,去讨论那些实质性的问题.
sentences.en: It would also leave more room to engage Chinese officials on subjects that actually matter.

sentences.cn: 一家三代居住在7.3平方米的空间里.
sentences.en: The three generations live in one 7.3 sq . m room.

sentences.cn: 他用屏风在起居室中隔开了一些空间,供他睡觉时使用.
sentences.en: He hedged off some space in the sitting room for bedding with a screen.

sentences.cn: 但是在多元主义和相对主义的体系里面已经没有了逻辑存在的空间.
sentences.en: There is no room for logic in any system of pluralism and relativism.

sentences.cn: 嘴护套能使你的上下鄂前伸, 使你喉管内有更多的空间.
sentences.en: They work by moving your jaw forward, allows more room in your throat.

sentences.cn: 那间办公室极小, 只有刚够摆一张写字台、两把椅子的空间.
sentences.en: The office is minute, with barely room for a desk and two chairs.

sentences.cn: 请在两边留出足够空间以备转向或接地环转.
sentences.en: Please leave ample room on both sides for swinging or ground looping.

sentences.cn: 这衣柜占的空间太大.
sentences.en: The wardrobe takes up too much room.

sentences.cn: 现代生活中, 客厅已经成为每个家庭必不可少的活动空间.
sentences.en: In the modern life, the living room already became each family essential activity space.

sentences.cn: 有空间不大,如美丽的输家,在目前正在进行的三月的进展.
sentences.en: There is little room for such beautiful losers in the ongoing march of progress.

sentences.cn: 在国内问题上没有多少空间进行周旋的政府官员,从历史上看会把目光转向国外的花絮事件中 ( 琼迪迪翁 )
sentences.en: Administrations with little room to maneuver at home have historically looked for sideshows abroad ( Joan Didion )

sentences.cn: 博拉格称,土地利用率越高, 留给雨林的空间就越多.
sentences.en: The more intensively you farm , Mr Borlaug contends, the more room you have left for rainforest.

sentences.cn: 这空间是否能使两人同时进入?
sentences.en: Is there room for two people at a time to pass in?

sentences.cn: 你的工作还有改进的余地。
sentences.en: There's some room for improvement in your work (= it is not as good as it could be) .

sentences.cn: 随着大选临近，他几乎没有什么回旋的余地了。
sentences.en: With an election looming, he has little room for manoeuvre.

sentences.cn: 我肯定还有商量的余地.
sentences.en: I'm certain tITe is some room for negotiation.

sentences.cn: 但是留有的余地越大, 命令的有效程度也就越小.
sentences.en: But the greater the wriggle room, the less effective the mandates will be.

sentences.cn: 本工作间回旋余地微乎其微.
sentences.en: The working room is narrow.

sentences.cn: 父亲母亲的计划和希望,丝毫没为意外事故留个余地.
sentences.en: His parents'hopes and plans left no room for any unforeseen circumstances.

sentences.cn: 我们的新厨房极小, 连转身的余地都没有.
sentences.en: Our new kitchen is tiny, with not enough room to swing a cat.

sentences.cn: 已经不再有希望的余地了.
sentences.en: There is any room for hope.

sentences.cn: 这一点是没有争论余地的.
sentences.en: There is no room for this aspect to be argued on.

sentences.cn: 在这个问题上没有调和的余地.
sentences.en: There is no room for compromise on this matter.

sentences.cn: 价格与目前市价一致,没有降价的余地了.
sentences.en: The price is in line with the prevailing market and there is no room for reduction.

sentences.cn: 政府有足够的回旋余地.
sentences.en: The government has plentiful room to manoeuvre.

sentences.cn: 在选择压力表的上限值时应留有充分的余地.
sentences.en: In selecting the upper limit value, sufficient room shall be maintained.

sentences.cn: 已经没有改进的余地了.
sentences.en: This leaves no room for improvement.

sentences.cn: 尤其是随着对外开放广度与深度的加大, 需求方的选择余地更大.
sentences.en: Especially as openthe outside world of range and deepness increase, demand square choice room is bigger.

sentences.cn: 我确定还有磋商的余地.
sentences.en: I'm sure there is some room for negotiation.

sentences.cn: 我恐怕没有多大降价的余地.
sentences.en: I'm afraid there is mot much room for further reduction.

sentences.cn: Leibniz在 区分可能世界与真实世界时确实留有怀疑的余地.
sentences.en: Leibniz did leave some room for doubt when he distinguished between possible and actual worlds.

sentences.cn: 在争论这问题上不留余地.
sentences.en: There is no any room for argument on that point.

sentences.cn: 你的英语尚有进一步提高的余地.
sentences.en: There is room for further improvement in English.

sentences.cn: 西班牙的较低的债务负担使得回旋的余地较为宽裕.
sentences.en: Spain's low debt burden creates some room for manoeuvre.

sentences.cn: 尽管有这么些家具用品, 倒还有转身余地.
sentences.en: Notwithstanding all this furniture, there was still room to turn around in.

sentences.cn: 那间小的顶楼寝室是那样的狭窄,我们连转个身的余地也没有.
sentences.en: The little attic bedroom was so small that there wasn't room to swing a cat.

sentences.cn: 没有犹豫的余地.
sentences.en: There is no room for hesitation.

sentences.cn: 关于主权问题, 中国在这个问题上没有回旋余地.
sentences.en: On the question of sovereignty, China has no room for manoeuvre.

sentences.cn: 你的工作还有改进的余地.
sentences.en: There's room for improvement in your work.

sentences.cn: 我们要保留猜测的余地.
sentences.en: We want to leave some . room for speculation.

sentences.cn: 价格毫无再减的余地了.
sentences.en: There is no room for any reduction in price.

sentences.cn: 假如接着再来一场经融危机的话,我们将没有多少回旋的余地.
sentences.en: And it would leave us with considerably reduced room for maneuver if another crisis comes along.

sentences.cn: 在一个容纳450人的房间里, 所有的人都在鼓掌.
sentences.en: In a room full of 450 people, everyone was clapping.

sentences.cn: 他们住在肯辛顿的出租房间。
sentences.en: They lived in rooms in Kensington.

sentences.cn: 现有一单人房出租,房内家具齐全, 包水电和上网, 友善房东,招一爱干净女生入住.
sentences.en: A single room for rent finished, including water power and internet. Prefer a girl to rent.

sentences.cn: 他们向大学生出租房间.
sentences.en: They let rooms to college students.

sentences.cn: 客房60间另会议室 、 餐厅 、 停车场 、 包租房 、 套房 、 棋牌室 、 执照均齐全.
sentences.en: Rooms 60 separate meeting rooms, restaurant, parking, rental packages, suites, chess dominoes room, licenses are complete.

sentences.cn: 她出租房间给学生住.
sentences.en: She rents out rooms to students.

sentences.cn: 杜洛埃知道华拔士路有个地方出租房间.
sentences.en: Drouet knew a place in Wabash Avenue where there were rooms.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 我们面临是租房还是买房的问题.
sentences.en: We face are the rent rooms or the problem bought the room.

sentences.cn: 于是,她们便住在波士顿地区,栖身于收容所 、 福利旅馆, 或租房.
sentences.en: Thus began a stay at shelters, welfare hotels, and rented rooms throughout the Boston area.

sentences.cn: 而对于流动人口来说, 租房是最实际的选择.
sentences.en: But regarding the transient population, rents a room is the most actual choice.

sentences.cn: 我要租房间近烟安西路和番禺路. 很干净!
sentences.en: English speaking female looking for a budget room near Yanan west road and Panyu road.

sentences.cn: 这寡妇沦为出租房间来维持生活.
sentences.en: The widow was reduced to letting rooms to make ends meet.

sentences.cn: 生意冷清,她挂出了“出租房屋“的招牌.
sentences.en: Business languished and she out a Room to Let card.

sentences.cn: 生意冷清,她挂出了“出租房屋”的招牌.
sentences.en: Business languished and she hung out a Room to Let card.

sentences.cn: 我怎样才可以得到租房的信息 呢 ?
sentences.en: How can I get information for renting a room?

sentences.cn: 出租房间设施: 一张单人床, 双人床垫, 衣柜, 小书柜等.
sentences.en: Rental Room facilities: a single bed, double bed, wardrobe, small bookcases and so on.

sentences.cn: 她和南希在大学里合住一处。
sentences.en: She and Nancy roomed together at college.

sentences.cn: 我们暂时合住一个房间 吧!
sentences.en: Let's share the room for the time being.

sentences.cn: 无论房间多么小, 我宁愿一个人住一间, 而不愿意与别人合住一个房间.
sentences.en: I � � d rather have a room of my own, however small ( it is ), than share a room.

sentences.cn: 我们两个人合住一间小房.
sentences.en: We share a small room between us.

sentences.cn: 我们合住一个房间.
sentences.en: We share one room.

sentences.cn: 他跟威·罗杰斯在塞奇威克旅馆合住一个房间.
sentences.en: He was to share a room at the Hotel Sedgwick with W . A . Rogers.

sentences.cn: 我们只余一个房间,你只好和彼得合住一处了.
sentences.en: We've only one room left : you'll have to double up with Peter.

sentences.cn: 我们只馀一个房间,你只好和彼得合住一处了.
sentences.en: We've only one room left : you'll have to double up with Peter.

sentences.cn: 山姆和我合住一间房间.
sentences.en: Sam and I share a room.

sentences.cn: 房间不够了,恐怕你们有几位只能两人合住一间了.
sentences.en: I'm afraid some of you will have to double up because there aren't enough rooms.

sentences.cn: 他们暂时合住在一个小房间里.
sentences.en: They were camping out together in a small room.

sentences.cn: 你若同意合住双人房间就可以省下单间附加费了。
sentences.en: You can avoid the single supplement by agreeing to share a twin room.

sentences.cn: 他很快就找到一处投宿的地方.
sentences.en: Soon he found a room to live in.

sentences.cn: 卡尔正在和旅馆柜台洽谈住宿费用的问题.
sentences.en: Carl is talking with a hotel clerk about room rates.

sentences.cn: 为我们安排旅馆住宿 吗 ?
sentences.en: Will you arrange hotel rooms for us?

sentences.cn: 请输入您的住宿日期以查询空房情况.
sentences.en: Please at time of booking which room type you require.

sentences.cn: 安顿好住宿后, 很少有客人使用行李服务.
sentences.en: Once roomed, few guests use bell service.

sentences.cn: 酒店拥有410间舒适奢华、宽敞明亮的客房及套房,让您享受到无与伦比的住宿体验.
sentences.en: Sheraton Jinan Hotel has 410 appointed and spacious guest rooms and suites.

sentences.cn: 学费与住宿费一定要同时交 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do I have to pay the tuition and room at the same time?

sentences.cn: 我要住宿, 还有空房间 吗 ?
sentences.en: I want to accommodate, Is there any vacant rooms?

sentences.cn: 登记员翻阅着预定单和住宿单.
sentences.en: The clerk shuffled reservation and room slips.

sentences.cn: 柯立芝把住宿费和回学校的两张火车票价合计了一下.
sentences.en: Coolidge added up the room rate and two rail tickets back to the campus.

sentences.cn: 住宿折扣仅限房费.
sentences.en: Accommodation discounts will be based on rooms only.

sentences.cn: 25又说: 我们家里足有粮草,也有住宿的地方.
sentences.en: She said moreover unto him , We have and provender enough and room to lodge in.

sentences.cn: 参会嘉宾交通和住宿费用自理,就餐由会议统一安排.
sentences.en: Trafic fee and room are paid by the guests . The meal is arranged by the conference.

sentences.cn: 酒店住宿费用及开支由团员向酒店直接缴付.
sentences.en: Payment of room rental and other expenses shall be made by delegates to the hotel direct.

sentences.cn: 当前, 大学生住宿公寓化已是普遍现象.
sentences.en: Current, undergraduate room boarding house is changed already was common phenomenon.

sentences.cn: 还有少数人未分配房间住宿.
sentences.en: A few persons are still unaccommodated with rooms for the night.

sentences.cn: 不要担心今晚的住宿问题, 我已事先与旅馆联系,请他们给我们留个房间.
sentences.en: Don't worry about a bed for tonight; I've sent ahead to the hotel to ask them to keep a room for us.

sentences.cn: 您一办完住宿登记, 行李员就会带您去您的房间.
sentences.en: As soon as you finish checking in, the porter will take you to your room.

sentences.cn: 许多宾馆为每个房间设置了卡片帮助房务操作员来分配住宿.
sentences.en: Many hotels have a card for each room to help the room clerk assign accommodations.

sentences.cn: 旅馆住宿费由公司承担.
sentences.en: The company will pay for the hotel rooms.

sentences.cn: 你需要比学校狭窄宿舍舒适的住宿环境 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you need a place to stay outside the cramped rooms here?

sentences.cn: 住宿费包括三餐膳食费.
sentences.en: The room rate includes three full meals.

sentences.cn: 能安排旅馆住宿 吗 ?
